body.name: Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo, EDJO 2.4G Full-Sized Large Wireless Keyboard with Comfortable Palm Rest and Optical Wireless Mouse for Windows, Mac OS PC/Desktops/Computer/Laptops
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ▶【Comfortable Large Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo】: EDJO Full-sized wireless keyboard mouse combo has a comfortable touch and typing feel, this wireless keyboard design with comfortable large palm rest and silicone folding holder that can protect your wrists from injury even when typing for a long time. NOTE: THE USB RECEIVER IS STORED IN THE BATTERY COMPARTMENT OF THE MOUSE, YOU CAN FIND IT WHEN OPEN THE MOUSE BATTERY COVER.

▶【Plug & Play 2.4G Wireless Connection】: This wireless keyboard and mouse combo share the same USB receiver, no need to take up additional USB ports (The keyboard or mouse can also be used separately). Plug & play, no need to download any software, 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays.

▶【Automatic Power Saving Function】: The EDJO wireless keyboard and mouse combo has the function of automatically entering the power-saving state. When you stop using the keyboard more than 6 minutes, stop using the mouse more than 15 minutes, they will enter sleep mode respectively to save power. This feature greatly extends the battery life, you can click any button to activity the device. The keyboard need 1 x AA battery, the mouse need 1 x AA battery. (Battery Not Included)

▶【3 Adjustable DPI Optical Wireless Mouse】: This is a optical wireless mouse with 3 levels adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600), you can get your favorite mouse movement speed by adjusting the DPI button. Optical wireless mouse also can smooth movement even on smooth surfaces. In addition, this wireless mouse is ergonomic design, provide you with the most comfortable grip.

▶【12+6 Multimedia Hotkeys & 3 Indicator Light】: This wireless keyboard has 12+6 multimedia hotkeys that allow you to reach the Email, Music, Volume Control and other applications in one step, make your work easier. There are also has 3 Indicator light (Number Lock indicator/ Caps Lock indicator/ Power indicator) on the keyboard that allows you to know the working status of the keyboard at any time.

▶【Universal Compatibility and 12 Months Warranty】: EDJO wireless keyboard and mice combo compatible with windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/X, Mac and other operating system. Works well with desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. EDJO promises that ALL OUR PRODUCT HAVE A 12-MONTH WARRANTY. Even after the Amazon return period, as long as you contact our email, we will help you solve all problems.
body.description: Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury The keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Intergrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. One USB Receiver Can Contect Both The Keyboard and Mouse Wireless Keyboard Indicator 12+6 Multimedia Hotkeys The Optical Mouse With 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600).

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 365 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EDJO EDJO is a professional computer peripheral equipment manufacturer with more than 15 years of history, with a development team and a factory. We are committed to the development and production of wireless keyboards, wireless mice, gaming mechanical keyboards and other computer peripheral products. We used to only sell wholesale in offline stores, and now we are starting to sell online. Choose EDJO products, you will find that it is worthwhile and you will love with this brand. Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury The keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Intergrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. One USB Receiver Can Contect Both The Keyboard and Mouse Wireless Keyboard Indicator 12+6 Multimedia Hotkeys The Optical Mouse With 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600).

2 in 1 USB Receiver One USB receiver can connect both the keyboard and mouse, without taking up more USB ports. Note: Keyboard and mouse can also be used separately. Quiet Crater-switch This wireless keyboard with crater-switch design and anti-oxidation Sealed membrane, greatly extend the life of the keyboard. Wireless Keyboard Indicator There are Number Lock indicator/ Caps Lock indicator/ Power indicator in the upper right corner of the keyboard, let you know the working status of the keyboard at any time.

12+6 Multimedia Hotkeys This wireless keyboard has 12+6 multimedia hotkeys that allow you to reach the Email, Music, Volume Control and other applications in one step, make your work easier. The USB Receiver is in the mouse The USB Receiver is inserted in the battery compartment of the mouse, you can find it when you open the battery cover. 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600) The mouse has 3 DPI（800/1200/1600） for you to choose, you can choose your favorite cursor movement speed by adjusting the DPI.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love it. Good price for a good product. It's so quiet and exactly as it is described. This keyboard and mouse are a phenomenal value. They are so quiet. It has lasted a couple months without needing charging and I work from home 5 days a week. Definitely a great buy and well worth it. They are very comfortable to use. Keyboard feels good to type on. Mouse glides smoothly, battery life is great. It seems cheaply made given how light weight it is, but so far it’s been great. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it so much, I purchased a second set for work!
reviews.reviewText: I love the support the keyboard offers and the indicator lights that show when the numbers and caps lock are on. I haven't had a single issue with it having a poor signal to my computer. I originally purchased one set for my home office and loved it so much I purchased another set to take to work. It's much better than the one they provide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works good, definitely a cheaper keyboard but works as intended. Could have used a better user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy set up!
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Easy to set up. Worked right away with no hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hesitant and slow
reviews.reviewText: sometimes the you press the keys and it misses. The mouse a lot of the time is slow to follow hand movement and will often freeze. Not Satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, easy to use, surprisingly sturdy and runs on AA batteries
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product for a home office. All you need for it to work is buy 2 AA batteries and connect the USB that comes inside the mouse's battery compartment to your laptop and that's it! Very satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice keyboard. Easy to install. I was looking for a keyboard that was close to Microsoft's 5050 keyboard. This one met my requirements. The slight angle and the wrist rest work for me. If you are looking for a keyboard that is close to the 5050, give this one a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only for touch typists.
reviews.reviewText: I hate this keyboard. Works fine but if you are not a skilled touch typist forget it. dark gray on black keys make it a nightmare, font on keys is very small. O unfortunately didn't use it until after the return date. Tossing it and going for a lighted board. Hunt and peck usert run away.
